TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit AxHost/InvalidActiveXStateException extends System.Exception

summary.span: 無效狀態中參考 ActiveX 控制項時擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when the ActiveX control is referenced while in an invalid state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能參考的公用屬性和方法的 ActiveX 控制項的 ActiveX 控制項已具現化並初始化完全; 之後否則擲回例外狀況。The public properties and methods of an ActiveX control can only be referenced after the ActiveX control has been instantiated and initialized completely; otherwise the exception is thrown. 例外狀況類別包含所做的參考成員和類型成員的名稱。The exception class contains the name of the member that made the reference and the member type. 成員類型是其中一個列舉值。The member type is one of the enumerated values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會覆寫建構函式，而並方法衍生包裝 Microsoft 遮罩編輯 ActiveX 控制項的類別。The following code example overrides the constructor, and the and methods of an derived class that wraps the Microsoft Masked Edit ActiveX Control. 此程式碼需要您建立產生的原始程式碼 MSMask32.ocx 檔案上執行 AxImp.exe`/source`切換到產生的包裝函式類別，以進行編輯。This code requires that you have created the generated source code by running the AxImp.exe on the MSMask32.ocx file with the `/source` switch to generate the wrapper class to be edited. 此程式碼是只顯示在 C# 語法，因為這是唯一的語言輸出 AxImp.exe。This code is only shown in C# syntax because that is the only language output by the AxImp.exe. [!code-csharp[AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit/CS/axmsmask.cs#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，不指定參考 ActiveX 控制項的成員相關的資訊。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class without specifying information about the member that referenced the ActiveX control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.AxHost/ActiveXInvokeKind kind) cil managed
Public Sub New (name As String, kind As AxHost.ActiveXInvokeKind)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: name
param.span: 無效狀態中參考 ActiveX 控制項的成員名稱。

span.span: The name of the member that referenced the ActiveX control while it was in an invalid state.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並指出曾參考 ActiveX 控制項的成員名稱，以及它所進行的參考種類。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and indicates the name of the member that referenced the ActiveX control and the kind of reference it made.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會覆寫建構函式，而並方法衍生包裝 Microsoft 遮罩編輯 ActiveX 控制項的類別。The following code example overrides the constructor, and the and methods of an derived class that wraps the Microsoft Masked Edit ActiveX Control. 此程式碼需要您建立產生的原始程式碼 MSMask32.ocx 檔案上執行 AxImp.exe`/source`切換到產生的包裝函式類別，以進行編輯。This code requires that you have created the generated source code by running the AxImp.exe on the MSMask32.ocx file with the `/source` switch to generate the wrapper class to be edited. 此程式碼是只顯示在 C# 語法，因為這是唯一的語言輸出 AxImp.exe。This code is only shown in C# syntax because that is the only language output by the AxImp.exe. [!code-csharp[AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit/CS/axmsmask.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前例外狀況的字串表示。

span.span: Creates and returns a string representation of the current exception.

returns.span: 目前例外狀況的字串表示。

span.span: A string representation of the current exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回字串，包含該文件中提供這項資訊如果參考 ActiveX 控制項和參考類型的成員資訊建構函式。This method returns a string containing information about the member that referenced the ActiveX control and the kind of reference it made if this information was supplied in the constructor.
